plugins.name: javascriptkit
plugins.description: Assist Swift developers who consume JavaScriptKit, a Swift library for interacting with JavaScript APIs via WebAssembly

plugins.name: bridgejs
plugins.description: Assist Swift developers using BridgeJS for Swift-to-JavaScript interoperability in WebAssembly projects

plugins.name: porting
plugins.description: Check Swift on Wasm compatibility, identify incompatible frameworks, port and refactor code for WebAssembly
